alert.note: Alert for Tunica (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 1:43PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Lee, southeastern St. Francis, south central Crittenden and northern Tunica Counties through 215 PM CDT... At 143 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Brickeys, or near Hughes, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hughes, Tunica, Brickeys, North Tunica, Robinsonville, Cody, Clack, Kokomo, Commerce, Austin, Mud Lake, Peters, Council, Bruins, Beck, North Hughes, Diamond Woods, Banks, Whitehall and Bowdre. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
